H0.text: where does the water come from to fill lake eyre. Cooper Creek

H1.text: where does the water come from to fill lake eyre. Diamantina River

H2.text: where does the water come from to fill lake eyre. Georgina River

H3.text: where does the water come from to fill lake eyre. Warburton River

A4.text: floodwaters drain via the main rivers of the basin—Cooper Creek, Georgina River, and Diamantina River—southwards towards Kati Thanda–Lake Eyre, the country's lowest point at 16 metres (52 ft) below sea level.
